Articles.Content:
Bought this game in the early days (the update before nimbus was added) so as a result i get expansions for free.

With Breaking ground been out i've wanted to play it again, played a bit with making history and had no issues.

Now with breaking ground Im very eager to play again and make robotic arms and suck, Problem is this issue stopping me

https://imgur.com/a/PgvBgzJ

I ahve it on steam done the whole check thing it says 2 files have been recovered but then when i start it up i get that samne error.

What do I have to do to fix this tissue

2 hours ago, Krubus said:

nimbus

Nimbus?   Minmus perhaps? 

There's at least one thread bouncing around here with the same complaint,   I didn't find them again, you might though, check there to see if they have found a fix.  

Ahha!  Found it!

Ok, taking another look at screen shot, I don't even need the thread, you're on 1.6, you need 1.7.1

2 hours ago, Krubus said:

https://imgur.com/a/PgvBgzJ

I ahve it on steam done the whole check thing it says 2 files have been recovered but then when i start it up i get that samne error.

What do I have to do to fix this tissue 

Breaking Grounds requires KSP 1.7.1 and the game version displayed in your screenshot says you're running KSP 1.6.1.

Steam should always keep your game up to date except, you enforce a previous version via the "beta" settings (right click ksp in your library -> properties -> betas). Should also be visible in the library already, where this is indicated by a version number in bracelets behind the name:

If this is not the case, I would go for a reinstall since something seem to be pretty wonky there.

Edited June 8, 2019 by 4x4cheesecake

Cheers guys i've got it sorted.

Was using  ckan on version 1.6 (Man i feel dumb)

Looking forward to making things again on this
